vow.option: abstain from alcoholic beverages, drugs, and intoxication
avoid violence against other sentient creatures
live according to the dictates of a superior in the religious order or similar organization
submit to those who ask of it
abstain from harming any living creature
seek glory, honor, and victory in tribute
constantly move from place to place, never settling
refrain from accepting compensation for any services rendered
abstain from extholing your own virtues
defend a group or groups with your very life
reunite factions after a long and bitter feud
never affiliate with or take orders from any organization, including the church
